passive.name: Fungal Bloom
passive.description: Whenever you apply Poison, gain 1 Bloom. At 3 Bloom, summon a Spore Totem for 2 rounds.

moves.name: Spore Dart
moves.description: Fire a toxic spore that poisons the target over time.

moves.name: Totem Call
moves.description: Directly summon a Spore Totem to aid you in battle.

moves.name: Dark Mist
moves.description: Shroud all enemies in shadow, reducing their accuracy.

moves.name: Overgrowth Field
moves.description: Create a poisonous spore field that damages enemies each turn.

exploration_perk.name: Fungal Network
exploration_perk.description: Can communicate with mushroom colonies to gain information about nearby areas and hazards.

quirks.behavior: Gently pulses with bioluminescent glow, releasing harmless spores
Spreads mycelium tendrils across the ground
Dims glow and hunkers into defensive mushroom cap

ranks.name: Starter
ranks.visual_changes: Small glowing mushroom creature with basic cap

ranks.name: Expert
ranks.visual_changes: Larger with multiple mushroom caps and enhanced glow

move_upgrade.improvement: Poison duration increased to 3 turns, damage per turn increased to 12

ranks.name: Legendary
ranks.unlock_requirement: Reach Level 25 and master the Ancient Grove
ranks.visual_changes: Magnificent colony form with ethereal shadow-grass aura

passive_upgrade.description: Fungal Bloom now requires only 2 Bloom stacks, and totems last for 3 rounds.

spore_totem.name: Spore Totem
spore_totem.effect: At end of each round, applies Poison (1 turn) to one random enemy
spore_totem.visual: A glowing mushroom totem with pulsing spores
